tuv.seg: The Constitution states that the Taoiseach must nominate a member of Dáil Eireann for the position of Tanaiste
Deir An Bunreacht go gcaithfidh an Taoiseach ball de Dáil Eireann a ainmniú mar Thánaiste
The Tanaiste is the deputy Taoiseach
Is é/í an Tánaiste an Leas-Thaoiseach
They act in place of the Taoiseach if the Taoiseach is abroad or ill
Feidhmníonn sé/sí in áit an Taoisigh má tá an Taoiseach thar lear nó tinn
If the Taoiseach were to die or become permanently incapacitated, the Tanaiste would stand in until a new Taoiseach was appointed
Dá dtarlódh sé go bhfaigheadh an Taoiseach bás nó go mbeadh sé/sí faoi mhíchumas buan, sheasfadh an Tánaiste isteach go dtí go mbeadh Taoiseach nua tofa
The Tanaiste may also hold a ministerial portfolio, which means that they may also be a minister of a Department of State
Is féidir leis an Tánaiste Aireacht a bheith aige/aici freisin, rud a fhágann go mbíonn sé/sí freisin ina (h)Aire ar Roinn Stáit
Information on the current Tanaiste is available here
Tá eolas ar an Tánaiste láithreach anseo
Like the other members of the Government, the Tanaiste may be dismissed by the Taoiseach if they consider that there is sufficient reason to do so
Is féidir leis an Taoiseach an Tánaiste a chur as an bpost, díreach mar is féidir leis /léi aon Aire eile a chur as a p(h)ost, má cheapann sé/sí go bhfuil cúis mhaith chun sin a dhéanamh
